hooks.prompt: Check if an SDD pipeline stage was active during this session. Look for evidence of SDD skill invocations (requirements-engineer through task-implementer) by checking if pipeline-state.json has any stage with status 'running'. If NO pipeline work was detected, respond {"decision": "allow"}. If pipeline work was detected, verify that: (1) artifacts were created in the expected directories, (2) pipeline-state.json was updated. If the stop_hook_active flag is present in context, respond {"decision": "allow"} to prevent loops. Summarize any incomplete pipeline stages as a warning. Respond with JSON only.
